Class WaveManager

java.lang.Object
logic.game.WaveManager
public class WaveManager extends Object
Manages the progression of game waves and the timing of enemy spawns.

Uses a separate background thread to handle the "Wait -> Spawn -> Wait" logic so it doesn't block the main game loop or the UI.
